description: Come in, youngsters! The best way to match you up with a dragon companion is getting to know you just a little bit. So please, let's talk. Let's see... how many of you are there, again?

results.name: Armor Dragon
results.description: A vigilant dragon with a strong sense of justice. It's known for being amongst the most protective of dragons.

results.name: Blast Dragon
results.description: A feisty dragon with a bit of a temper. It's strength comes with its unbridled rage.

results.name: Bruiser Dragon
results.description: A headstrong dragon that packs a wicked punch. It doesn't always listen, but when it cooperates, it's a powerful ally.

results.name: Earth Dragon
results.description: A docile dragon that prefers not to fight. It loves to travel, and appreciates all things nature.

results.name: Fairy Dragon
results.description: A cute dragon with a very introverted personality. It takes times to earn its trust, but learns to love more than any other kind of dragon.

results.name: Fire Dragon
results.description: A playful dragon with a very naive and youthful personality. It has long way to mature, but, once grown, becomes a very powerful companion.

results.name: Lightning Dragon
results.description: An aloof dragon with incredible speed. It tends to have a hard time trusting others, so consider yourself lucky if you manage to earn the trust of one.

results.name: Marsh Dragon
results.description: A curious dragon that hates to be alone. It loves to bathe in the water, but never wants to be too far from its friends.

results.name: Rainbow Dragon
results.description: An intelligent dragon that acts more strategically than other dragons. It prefers to wait and observe before making any rash actions.

results.name: Regal Dragon
results.description: A heroic dragon that puts itself in danger for those who can't protect themselves. As a royal dragon, it believes it's its job to do so.

results.name: Shadow Dragon
results.description: A patient dragon that allows others to endanger themselves before stepping forward. It has an incredible amount of power, but it's very draining to use it all.

results.name: War Dragon
results.description: A hard-working dragon that wants to fight, nonstop. It hates to rest, and it hates to wait.
